scripts.dev: cd backend && pnpm dev && cd ../frontend && pnpm dev
scripts.build: cd backend && pnpm build && cd ../frontend && pnpm build
scripts.install: cd backend && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.lint: cd backend && pnpm lint && cd ../frontend && pnpm lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && pnpm lint:fix && cd ../frontend && pnpm lint:fix
scripts.format: cd backend && pnpm format && cd ../frontend && pnpm format
scripts.format:check: cd backend && pnpm format:check && cd ../frontend && pnpm format:check
